text: Roscoe Hunter Orman (born June 11, 1944) is an American actor and comedian. He is best known for playing Gordon Robinson on Sesame Street. He was born in The Bronx, New York. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:American television actors Category:Singers from New York (state) Category:Actors from New York (state)
title: Roscoe Orman
